title: Perma-banned after only 1 warning
body:
So, I was playing One for all and I was mid(as {{champion:89}} against{{champion:74}} ) and fed lane(ofc what can u do against a donger as a trash support) and other laners started to flame me because I was feeding(like a typical league player)(they were feeding too). I got salty as fuck and started swearing and shit(like another typical league player).
The one silver who talked trash(he started first with ur trash and this is no lie) reported me for swearing and after another game, insta-ban. I only got one toxic behavior warning(it was a warning and 3 day chat ban? something like that). It is unfair when I didn't report him(really should have that silver C#*$&!!#%!*%!#$!*@$!$) and he reported me for 4 types of swear words(I did say types)(one was a bit harsh but welp)
What I said(and what he reported me for):Game 1
ID das: all mid it is
ID das: k
ID das: says the o0ne being a pussy and bailed
ID das: jew
ID das: u made me do it
ID das: well yea cuz 90% of leagfue players are jews
ID das: it's a fact look it up
ID das: says the silver
ID das: oh now I know why ur so toxic
ID das: bc ur silver
ID das: and are actually trying to win
ID das: because this is totally ranked
ID das: eight?
ID das: if u used E I wouldn't have died
ID das: why am I even talking to a tryhard
ID das: dont even bother typing cuz I muted u a long time ago
ID das: lol who
ID das: stop missing ur bomb stuns
ID das: makes me feel bad
ID das: wasnt aiming fir u
ID das: also
ID das: wanna not distract me?
ID das: k but u missed 8 bombs
ID das: and u landed 2
ID das: 20% accuracy
ID das: say rekt again cuz I will say you did nothing but autoattack me
ID das: canty chill when u started it
ID das: you gotta end it
ID das: its called helping you to improve
ID das: lol rekt doesnt mean improve
ID das: it means fuck you noob go kys
ID das: lol
ID das: right amount is good for u
ID das: oh im already here?
ID das: lo
ID das: l
ID das: lol
ID das: specify 'noobs'
ID das: oh yea it stacks doesn't it
ID das: 4v1 ok
ID das: lol its called zilea ult
ID das: I hate this keyboard
ID das: not my keyboard smh
ID das: hate typing on cherrymx
ID das: u made me do it again
ID das: talking to boognish bt
ID das: w
ID das: age?
ID das: if u dont mind
ID das: prob
ID das: stop making me play Faker's minigame smh
ID das: oh
ID das: ok
ID das: gg
yes I was pretty toxic but the problem is
you can't see what he typed(use your imagination)
when I log in it says '10-game chat restriction' but it says I am perma-banned when I hover over play.
like
is this a gitch? or am I really perma-banned on my $1395(that's how much I spent with credit card, not counting gift cards) account?
THE POINT IS I ONLY HAD 1 WARNING AFTER A PERMA-BAN

replies.body:
I mean you made some pretty antisemitic  comments along with telling people to kill themselves. Racism, wishing self harm, threats, and sexual harassment are the worst offenses as far as player behavior goes and they are grounds for escalated punishment. This means you will skip punisment tiers. You fall under multiple of these categories so it is possible to get escalated to the point you are at now.

$$$ youve spent on the game is irrelevent. In the furture I would suggest trying to protect your investment better by reading the terms you agree to
Did YOU read all of the terms?
comment above still stands. you made a racist comment. sorry bud.
you made a racist comment, they aren't funny or tolerated in any form.
1 warning should be enough
>ID das: it means fuck you noob go kys

lol you mean
ID das: jew
ID das: u made me do it
ID das: well yea cuz 90% of leagfue players are jews
ID das: it's a fact look it up
?
injoy youâ€™re ban

waiting for comments like 'you deserve it' or 'why bother posting' or 'we don't want toxic players like you here'
I am only toxic when others are toxic to me(I'm usually chill unless someone starts it)

> [{quoted}](name=ID das,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=vVU9pz06,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-04-06T02:25:12.675+0000)
>
> waiting for comments like 'you deserve it' or 'why bother posting' or 'we don't want toxic players like you here'
> I am only toxic when others are toxic to me(I'm usually chill unless someone starts it)

Sadly that is not an excuse, "he started it" is neither tolerated in a schoolyard, workplace, court, or an online game.

You used racist language, told people to kill themselves, flames, and generally acted intolerably.

It's pretty rare to get permabanned off of one game. These logs do bring up religion and "kys," which can escalate your punishment.

I'd write into support, and hopefully they can clear up why you got (or think you got) only 1 prior warning/punishment.

Thanks for the only helpful comment, I am re-downloading the game to see if I really am perma-banned or not.
If I am, I will write a support ticket.
Again, thanks.

After living a peaceful life for 1 month, I revisited this forum and Periscope, the moderator said quote: 'It's pretty rare to get permabanned off of one game. These logs do bring up religion and "kys," which can escalate your punishment.
I'd write into support, and hopefully they can clear up why you got (or think you got) only 1 prior warning/punishment.' and I thought about what It said when I logged in. '7 day ban for toxicity' 
I didn't pay attention too closely, and also I clicked something when I first re-logged after the ban, so I thought I was perma-banned(as this being the first ban that was long the previous one I just logged out and played some other game) so, I am currently re-installing the game and checking to see if it was a perma-ban or a 7 day ban(which should be cleared since it has been a month).
hopefully I can keep my $3000 account.
One more thing about the game, there is zero indication for how long you will be banned for. This is the reason why I thought I was perma-banned(idk still if I am or not) no indication of the duration, the reason, nor by whom.(except for the first time you log in to the game)
Also, to everyone who thinks I'm toxic all the time, harassing players, being racist to others, I am pretty chill most of the time. Most times I take it as a joke you know, teenage talk. But if they keep coming at me with like 'You are trash uninstall plz' or 'why do you play this game go kys' like that I respond with fire. When they cross the line, I don't care.
Update: I logged in and now it only says: 10-game chat restriction, still downloading the game.

also
I can still purchase rp on a perma-banned account. money whores smh...
just delete my acc pls I'm done with this game
I'm sorry for your parents money but you deserved it :p
Thats a down vote. You are incredibly toxic.
how is this INCREDIBLY toxic? yeah it's not my nicest comment but I mean can't take a joke?

> [{quoted}](name=ID das,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=vVU9pz06,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2018-04-06T02:36:43.227+0000)
>

> I can still purchase rp on a perma-banned account. money whores smh...
> just delete my acc pls I'm done with this game

Don't leave, you're such a positive influence on this community :^)

>
> Don't leave, you're such a positive influence on this community :^)

LMAO {{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}

and idc about skins when I can't even use them
delete it
Relog and tell us what the system message says when you log in.

Ignore the ignorant people in this comment section. If you can spend 3000$ on a game you clearly are more successful and make plenty more money than the people do in the comment section. Keep your head up and ignore the people below.
money spent shouldn't be a factor while regarding if a player should or should not be banned. He deserved his ban as he said stuff id rather not repeat.

k then rip my $3000 account(gathered up all of my riot cards that I kept and its about that much)
well at least I have like 5 more
